00030 #define         MAX_WIN_FONTS   10
00031 
00032 // Private struct not to be exported
00033 // to other modules
00034 typedef struct
00035 {
00036   HFONT       hFont;  
00037   COLORVAL    ForeColor;
00038   COLORVAL    BackColor;
00039 
00040 } HWINFONT;

00042 LOGFONT gLogFont;

00044 HWINFONT    WinFonts[ MAX_WIN_FONTS ];

00046 
00047 void Convert16BitStringTo8BitChineseBig5String( UINT8 *dst, UINT16 *src )
00048 {
00049       INT32 i, j;
00050       char *ptr;
00051 
00052       i = j = 0;
00053       ptr = (char*)src;
00054       while( ptr[j] || ptr[j + 1] )
00055       {
00056             if( ptr[j] )
00057             {
00058                   dst[i] = ptr[j];
00059                   dst[ i + 1 ] = '\0';
00060                   i++;
00061             }
00062             j++;
00063       }
00064 }

00068 void InitWinFonts( )
00069 {
00070   memset( WinFonts, 0, sizeof( WinFonts ) );
00071 }

00074 {

00078 INT32 FindFreeWinFont( void )
00079 {
00080   INT32 iCount;
00081 
00082       for( iCount = 0; iCount < MAX_WIN_FONTS; iCount++ )
00083   {
00084             if( WinFonts[ iCount ].hFont == NULL )
00085     {
00086                   return( iCount );
00087     }
00088   }
00089 
00090       return( -1 );
00091 }

00093 
00094 HWINFONT *GetWinFont( INT32 iFont )
00095 {
00096   if ( iFont == -1 )
00097   {
00098     return( NULL );
00099   }
00100 
00101   if ( WinFonts[ iFont ].hFont == NULL )
00102   {
00103     return( NULL );
00104   }
00105   else
00106   {
00107     return( &( WinFonts[ iFont ] ) );
00108   }
00109 }
00110 
00111 UINT16 gzFontName[32];
00112 
00113 INT32 CreateWinFont( INT32 iHeight, INT32 iWidth, INT32 iEscapement,  
00114                      INT32 iWeight, BOOLEAN fItalic,  BOOLEAN fUnderline,  BOOLEAN fStrikeOut, STR16 szFontName, INT32 iCharSet )
00115 {
00116   INT32   iFont;
00117   HFONT   hFont;
00118       UINT8  szCharFontName[32]; //32 characters including null terminator (matches max font name length)
00119   // Find free slot
00120   iFont = FindFreeWinFont( );
00121 
00122   if ( iFont == -1 )
00123   {
00124     return( iFont );
00125   }
00126 
00127       //SET UP FONT WE WANT TO LOAD HERE
00128       wcscpy( gzFontName, szFontName );
00129 
00130       //ATTEMPT TO LOAD THE FONT NOW
00131       sprintf( (char *) szCharFontName, "%S", szFontName );
00132       if( DoesWinFontExistOnSystem( szFontName, iCharSet ) )
00133       {
00134             gLogFont.lfHeight = iHeight;
00135             gLogFont.lfWidth = 0;
00136             hFont = CreateFontIndirect( &gLogFont );
00137       }
00138       else
00139       {
00140             FatalError( "Cannot load subtitle Windows Font: %S.", szFontName );
00141             return( -1 );
00142       }
00143 
00144   if ( hFont == NULL )
00145   {
00146     return( -1 );
00147   }
00148 
00149   // Set font....
00150   WinFonts[ iFont ].hFont = hFont;
00151 
00152   return( iFont );
00153 }

00155 void  DeleteWinFont( INT32 iFont )
00156 {
00157   HWINFONT *pWinFont;
00158   
00159   pWinFont = GetWinFont( iFont );
00160 
00161   if ( pWinFont != NULL )
00162   {
00163     DeleteObject( pWinFont->hFont );
00164   }
00165 }

00194 void PrintWinFont( UINT32 uiDestBuf, INT32 iFont, INT32 x, INT32 y, UINT16 *pFontString, ...)
00195 {
00196   va_list                 argptr;
00197   wchar_t                                                   string2[512];
00198       char                                                        string[512];
00199   HVSURFACE               hVSurface;
00200   LPDIRECTDRAWSURFACE2    pDDSurface;
00201   HDC                     hdc;
00202   RECT                    rc;
00203   HWINFONT                *pWinFont;
00204   int                     len;
00205   SIZE                    RectSize;
00206   
00207   pWinFont = GetWinFont( iFont );
00208 
00209   if ( pWinFont == NULL )
00210   {
00211     return;
00212   }
00213 
00214       va_start(argptr, pFontString);            // Set up variable argument pointer
00215       len = vswprintf(string2, pFontString, argptr);  // process gprintf string (get output str)
00216       va_end(argptr);
00217 
00218 #ifdef TAIWANESE
00219       Convert16BitStringTo8BitChineseBig5String( string, string2 );
00220 #else
00221       sprintf( string, "%S", string2 );
00222 #endif
00223 
00224   // Get surface...
00225   GetVideoSurface( &hVSurface, uiDestBuf );
00226 
00227   pDDSurface = GetVideoSurfaceDDSurface( hVSurface );
00228 
00229   IDirectDrawSurface2_GetDC( pDDSurface, &hdc );
00230 
00231   SelectObject(hdc, pWinFont->hFont );
00232   SetTextColor( hdc, pWinFont->ForeColor );
00233   SetBkColor(hdc, pWinFont->BackColor );
00234   SetBkMode(hdc, TRANSPARENT);
00235 
00236   GetTextExtentPoint32( hdc, string, len, &RectSize );
00237   SetRect(&rc, x, y, x + RectSize.cx, y + RectSize.cy );
00238   ExtTextOut( hdc, x, y, ETO_OPAQUE, &rc, string, len, NULL );
00239   IDirectDrawSurface2_ReleaseDC( pDDSurface, hdc );
00240 
00241 }

00243 INT16 WinFontStringPixLength( UINT16 *string2, INT32 iFont )
00244 {
00245   HWINFONT                *pWinFont;
00246   HDC                     hdc;
00247   SIZE                    RectSize;
00248       char              string[512];
00249   
00250   pWinFont = GetWinFont( iFont );
00251 
00252   if ( pWinFont == NULL )
00253   {
00254     return( 0 );
00255   }
00256 
00257 #ifdef TAIWANESE
00258       Convert16BitStringTo8BitChineseBig5String( string, string2 );
00259 #else
00260       sprintf( string, "%S", string2 );
00261 #endif
00262 
00263   hdc = GetDC(NULL);
00264   SelectObject(hdc, pWinFont->hFont );
00265   GetTextExtentPoint32( hdc, string, strlen(string), &RectSize );
00266   ReleaseDC(NULL, hdc);
00267   
00268   return( (INT16)RectSize.cx );
00269 }

00300 UINT32      WinFont_mprintf( INT32 iFont, INT32 x, INT32 y, UINT16 *pFontString, ...)
00301 {
00302   va_list                 argptr;
00303   wchar_t                   string[512];
00304 
00305       va_start(argptr, pFontString);            // Set up variable argument pointer
00306       vswprintf(string, pFontString, argptr);   // process gprintf string (get output str)
00307       va_end(argptr);
00308 
00309   PrintWinFont( FontDestBuffer, iFont, x,  y, string );
00310 
00311   return( 1 );
00312 }

00316 
00317   gfEnumSucceed = TRUE;
00318

00323 int CALLBACK EnumFontFamExProc( ENUMLOGFONTEX *lpelfe, NEWTEXTMETRICEX *lpntme, int FontType, LPARAM lParam )
00324 {
00325       UINT8 szFontName[32];
00326 
00327       sprintf( (char *)szFontName, "%S", gzFontName );
00328       if( !strcmp( (const char *) szFontName, (const char *)lpelfe->elfFullName ) )
00329       {
00330             gfEnumSucceed = TRUE;
00331             memcpy( &gLogFont, &(lpelfe->elfLogFont), sizeof( LOGFONT ) );
00332       }
00333 
00334       return TRUE;
00335 }

00337 
00338 BOOLEAN DoesWinFontExistOnSystem( STR16 pTypeFaceName, INT32 iCharSet )
00339 {
00340   HDC       hdc;
00341       char              string[512];
00342       LOGFONT LogFont;
00343   hdc = GetDC(NULL);
00344 
00345   gfEnumSucceed = FALSE;
00346       // Copy into 8-bit!
00347       sprintf( string, "%S", pTypeFaceName );
00348 
00349       memset( &LogFont, 0, sizeof( LOGFONT ) );
00350       LogFont.lfCharSet = iCharSet;
00351       lstrcpy( (LPSTR)&LogFont.lfFaceName, string );
00352 
00353       EnumFontFamiliesEx( hdc, &LogFont, (FONTENUMPROCA) EnumFontFamExProc, 0, 0 );
00354   
00355       ReleaseDC(NULL, hdc);
00356 
00357   return( gfEnumSucceed );
00358 }
